subject: PTO/Leave Request
body:
Hey Amanda,

I need to go see my family, my dad isn't doing great. Do you mind if I take next week off? I know the passport protocol, I promise I'll be safe.

Respectfully, Rachel

subject: Re: PTO/Leave Request
body:
Rachel,

I'm so sorry to hear your father is doing badly. I'll pray for him.

Unfortunately, now is a really bad time. Brazil has been ramping up intelligence ops here. It's only a matter of time before they find something out if you don't lay low for a while.

Maybe an encrypted video call instead?

-Amanda

subject: Re: Re: PTO/Leave Request
body:
Understood. I guess that's the cost of freedom...

Rachel
